alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Gallatin; Hamilton; Saline; Wabash; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 4:17AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional ice accumulations one tenth to locally two tenths of an inch likely. Little if any additional sleet accumulations are expected today. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Indiana and northwest Kentucky near the Wabash River and Ohio Rivers, as well as southeast Illinois. * WHEN...Through 6 PM CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the ice and sleet accumulation should be through early this morning. For the rest of the day, temperatures should rise above freezing and transition the precipitation over to all rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Edwards; Gallatin; Hamilton; Saline; Wabash; Wayne; White
